name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Developer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development, leveraging a robust skill set in **.NET**, **C#**, **Web API**, **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**. Proficient in modern frameworks including **NestJS**, **React**, and **Angular** to build dynamic applications efficiently. I excel in cloud technologies with hands-on experience in **AWS** and possess a strong understanding of Agile methodologies and DevOps practices.

My background encompasses the creation of automated testing frameworks, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) strategies, and the design of modern deployment pipelines, ensuring high-quality code and rapid delivery. I pride myself on being an adept problem-solver with strong communication and collaboration skills, essential for driving successful team outcomes. My previous projects have significantly enhanced operational efficiency and effectiveness in both healthcare and financial sectors.

Implemented agile methodologies to drive project timelines, enhancing team collaboration and ensuring project deliverables were met efficiently and effectively.

Developed automated testing procedures with tools like **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving high code coverage across both front-end and back-end services to elevate quality assurance processes.
Led the transformation of legacy monolithic applications into microservices architecture leveraging containerization technologies like **Docker** and orchestrators such as **Kubernetes**, which increased system scalability and reliability.
Utilized methodologies from Agile and DevOps to enhance team performance and operational efficiency, promoting ongoing iterative improvements with feedback loops.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and troubleshoot technical issues, utilizing **problem-solving** and **communication** skills to lift project outcomes and foster a collaborative environment.

Engaged with database technology to optimize queries and storage strategies for complex datasets, bolstering application performance and response times by up to **25%**.
Presented technical and operational reports via visualization tools like **Power BI**, contributing to better decision-making and performance insights based on live data trends.
